ygData.subject: Re: Suicide King
ygData.msgSnippet: I am not gonna make this private because I have something I have to get off my chest. JP, what is your major malfunction?  Why can t you be courteous? If this

To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Suicide King
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

I am not gonna make this private because I have something I have to get off
my chest. JP, what is your major malfunction?  Why can't you be courteous?
If this gets me kicked out of the game, so be it. You are a sadistic bully.
I've really enjoyed playing this game, except for when it comes to dealing
with you. Playing with people like Roborick and Yanshosh, and reading posts
by Kinger and Airly is enjoyable. But you are a waist of my time. Why would
he do this to get out of a game, instead of just saying "I Quit" Even if it
is a trick (which I dont believe it is, because I have more faith in
people) isnt it safer to just be polite? Just from reading your posts, I
knew you would do some kind of sick twisted thing like this. I feel for
you, because you obviously dont have any redeeming qualities. Go ahead and
insult me back, with your elementary bashing, and crude post. Nothing you
say matters, cause everyone on this chat is levels above you when it comes
to dealing with people. Go see a psychiatrist, because you are a royaly
screwed up person. Get a life. Sorry everybody, but I have no patience for
discusting scum.
